FuncDef: The display ip extcommunity-list segmented-nh command displays configured segmented-nh attributes.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a segmented-nh attribute list.
The value is a string of 1 to 51 characters.

Examples: Named Extended Community Segmented-NH advanced list: a
Named Extended Community Segmented-NH basic list: b
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Segmented-nh (with the full name being segmented nexthop) attributes are extended community attributes that can be carried in intra-AS I-PMSI A-D routes in NG MVPN scenarios. To check configured segmented-nh attributes, run the display ip extcommunity-list segmented-nh command.
